heading: south
description: A 13.8 x 11.7 meter single-story home featuring 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a 1-car garage, thoughtfully designed in a cozy Craftsman-style ranch layout. The private owner's suite offers comfort and privacy, complemented by a well-positioned secondary bedroom and bathroom. A convenient drop zone just off the garage enhances daily functionality, while an optional rear deck, patio, or sunroom provides additional flexibility for outdoor living and relaxation.

heading: south
description: A 15 x 15 meter colonial-style two-level home designed with timeless elegance and balanced proportions, offering 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms within a refined and functional layout. The exterior showcases classic symmetry and two welcoming front porches that enhance curb appeal, while a rear porch extends the living space outdoors. Inside, the main level includes a formal living room with a fireplace, a well-appointed kitchen, a dedicated dining room, and a convenient butler pantry that connects seamlessly for entertaining and storage. heading: south
description: A stately 20.6 x 20.75 meter colonial-style two-level home spanning approximately 427 square meters, designed with timeless elegance and refined proportions for discerning families seeking both grandeur and everyday comfort. The exterior presents classic colonial symmetry with a welcoming covered porch that enhances curb appeal and provides a gracious entry experience. Inside, the main level unfolds from an elegant foyer with a convenient cloak room, leading into a formal living room and a separate family room, each enhanced by its own fireplace to create warm, inviting gathering spaces. The well-appointed kitchen flows seamlessly into a bright morning room and connects to a dedicated dining room, while a butler pantry offers additional storage and serving flexibility for entertaining. A powder room and separate laundry room add everyday practicality, and a single-car garage with integrated storage completes the ground floor. An interior staircase and elevator provide smooth circulation between levels, accommodating accessibility needs. The upper floor offers three private bedrooms, including a generous master suite with a spacious ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, plus two secondary bedrooms each served by its own bathroom. Two balconies extend the living space outdoors with elevated views, while a rear patio provides additional space for outdoor relaxation and entertaining. With three fireplaces, thoughtful room separation, and a blend of formal and casual living areas, this home is ideal for families who value both traditional charm and modern convenience.
